author: Staff Reporter
text:
Jagan and Thangaraj stole a laptop, and an empty LPG cylinder from M. Sethil’s house on Fourth Street Extension, off 100 Feet Road, using the keys that was kept nearby on Thursday.

Woman robbed

Unidentified persons robbed D. Vatsala of her gold jewellery weighing about 120 gm at her tea stall in Thiyagi Sivaram Nagar on Friday morning.

Man killed

A 65-year-old man was fatally knocked down by a speeding vehicle in front of the GPT gate on Avinashi Road on Friday morning.

The police are yet to identify the deceased.

They police have registered a case against the vehicle driver, J. Saravanakumar, on charges of rash and negligent driving.

Worker killed

The police have registered a case against Nagaraj, a resident of Vedar Colony in Mettuppalayam for failing to take safety measures at the work spot on the farm land.

L. Vellingiri, a worker, had fallen into a well and drowned on Friday afternoon.
title: Laptop stolen
